string-array.name: skills_descriptions
string-array.item: I can develop Android apps, that are robust and reliant, and I am still learning what Android framework has to offer, to make them even faster and more efficient
I am aware of the stages of software production process from the idea to realization. I try my best to follow clean code rules, upkeeping project\'s code convention and software design principles
I know what are Material Design principles and how to apply them to create beautiful, accessible apps. I follow design principles mindful about ease of access and user experience
I am using modern development tools like DataBinding, provided by Android Jetpack
I am integrating Firebase into my apps
I am learning to apply functional and object-oriented Kotlin language in my day-to-day development
I am not afraid on improving my apps with cloud-based solutions like Google Cloud Platform. Learning about microservices architecture, Kubernetes and other cloud-oriented technologies
I am learning how to use popular libraries like Retrofit2, OkHttp, Picasso, Dagger2, RxJava2 and more!
I know how to use Source Control Version tools like Github and Microsoft TFS
